purpose: Facilitate the creation and deployment of intelligent agents through a modular and extensible framework.
principle: Built on a multi-agent system architecture, leveraging Python for agent logic and coordination.
reusability: Modular architecture allows for easy integration and extension; includes APIs for agent communication and orchestration.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have stability issues and limited documentation; primarily supports Python environments.
name: ii-agent
description: II-Agent: a new open-source framework to build and deploy intelligent agents
highlight: A versatile framework for building and deploying intelligent agents with a focus on multi-agent coordination.
